<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120547</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120547</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Detektorji pretoka  različnih velikosti za opis gostote skritega naboja</string>
            <string language="en">Different size flux detectors to describe a hidden charge density</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterschiedliche Größe Flußdetektoren, zum 
einer versteckten Ladung Dichte zu beschreiben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Différents détecteurs de flux de taille pour 
décrire une densité cachée de charge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Detetores diferentes do fluxo do tamanho para 
descrever uma densidade escondida da carga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rivelatori differenti di cambiamento continuo di 
formato per descrivere una densità nascosta della carica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαφορετικοί ανιχνευτές ροής μεγέθους για να 
περιγράψει μια κρυμμένη πυκνότητα δαπανών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diversos detectores del flux de la talla para 
describir una densidad ocultada de la carga</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Ugotavljanje razporeditve nabojev s pomočjo pretoka skozi gaussovo ploskev.</string>
            <string language="en">Determining unknown charge distribution with the use of an electric flux through the Gaussian surface.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električni naboj</string>
            <string language="en">electric charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električni pretok</string>
            <string language="en">electric flux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gaussov zakon</string>
            <string language="en">gauss's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bestimmung der unbekannten Ladung Verteilung mit 
dem Gebrauch von einem elektrischen Fluß durch die Gaußsche 
Oberfläche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Détermination de la distribution inconnue de 
charge avec l'utilisation d'un flux électrique par la surface 
gaussienne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determinando distribuição desconhecida da carga
com o uso de um fluxo elétrico através da superfície gaussian.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determinazione della distribuzione sconosciuta 
della carica con l'uso di un cambiamento continuo elettrico attraverso
la superficie gaussiana.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορισμός της άγνωστης διανομής δαπανών με τη χρήση 
μιας ηλεκτρικής ροής μέσω της γκαουσσιανής επιφάνειας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determinación de la distribución desconocida de
la carga con el uso de un flux eléctrico a través de la superficie 
gaussian.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Ladung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrischer Fluß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz des Gausss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">charge électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">flux électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi du gauss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">carga elétrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fluxo elétrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei do gauss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">carica elettrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cambiamento continuo elettrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge del gauss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρική δαπάνη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρική ροή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος Gaoy'</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">carga eléctrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">flux eléctrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ley del gauss</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
